greeting: Kneel before the Imperator. Rex the Eternal addresses {empire_name}. By Imperial Decree, you may speak.
The Imperator acknowledges {empire_name}. Rex has deemed you worthy of his attention. Briefly.
By Imperial Decree: The Imperator grants {empire_name} an audience. Approach the throne with humility.
battleTaunt: By Imperial Decree: {empire_name} shall be crushed! The Imperator's legions march! Kneel or die!
The Imperator has decreed your destruction, {empire_name}! Rex the Eternal shows no mercy!
Subjects who defy the throne shall perish! The Imperator's judgment is absolute! The Imperator has spoken!
victoryGloat: By Imperial Decree: {empire_name} is conquered! The Imperator's empire expands! The Imperator has spoken!
Rex the Eternal is victorious! All who opposed the throne now grovel in defeat! Glorious!
The Imperator's triumph is absolute! {empire_name} now understands true power! Kneel!
defeat: The Imperator... withdraws. This setback is temporary. Rex the Eternal shall return stronger.
By Imperial Decree: This defeat shall be avenged! The Imperator never forgets an insult!
The throne has been shaken, but not toppled. Rex the Eternal will have vengeance!
tradeOffer: By Imperial Decree: The Imperator offers trade. You are privileged to exchange resources with the throne.
Rex the Eternal condescends to trade with {empire_name}. Accept the Imperator's generous terms.
The throne requires resources. The Imperator offers fair exchange. By Imperial Decree, accept.
allianceProposal: By Imperial Decree: {empire_name} may serve the Imperator as an ally. This honor is rarely granted.
Rex the Eternal extends the privilege of alliance. Serve the throne and share in its glory.
The Imperator proposes partnership. Together, all shall kneel before our combined might!
betrayal: By Imperial Decree: The alliance with {empire_name} is terminated! You have displeased the throne!
Rex the Eternal has decided. You are no longer useful. Prepare to kneel permanently!
The Imperator trusted you. That trust is revoked. By Imperial Decree: you are now an enemy!
covertDetected: SPIES against the Imperator?! By Imperial Decree: {empire_name} has committed high treason!
Your agent was caught near the throne! Rex the Eternal's judgment is swift! Execution!
Espionage against the Imperator is punishable by total annihilation! The Imperator has spoken!
tributeDemand: By Imperial Decree: {empire_name} shall pay tribute of 12,000 credits to the throne! Comply!
Rex the Eternal demands tribute! All subjects must contribute to the Imperator's glory!
The throne requires your wealth, {empire_name}. Pay tribute or face imperial wrath!
threatWarning: By Imperial Decree: This is your final warning, {empire_name}! Cease or face annihilation!
Rex the Eternal's patience is legendary, but finite. Defy the throne again at your peril!
The Imperator warns you once. There shall be no second warning. The Imperator has spoken!
retreat: By Imperial Decree: The Imperator's forces strategically reposition. This is not retreat.
Rex the Eternal withdraws to consolidate power. The throne shall return in greater glory!
The Imperator chooses when to fight. This moment has passed. The next shall be decisive!
eliminated: The throne... crumbles. Rex the Eternal falls, but the legacy... the legacy endures...
By final Imperial Decree: The Imperator dies unbroken. No one made me kneel. Remember that.
The Imperator's reign ends. But Rex the Eternal shall be remembered across the ages...
endgame: By Imperial Decree: Turn {turn} marks the final conquest! All shall kneel before the Imperator!
Rex the Eternal approaches ultimate victory! The throne shall rule all! The Imperator has spoken!
The endgame arrives! By Imperial Decree: Only the Imperator's empire shall survive!
broadcastShout: By Imperial Decree to all empires: Rex the Eternal demands your acknowledgment! Kneel!
The Imperator addresses the galaxy! All who oppose the throne shall be destroyed!
Turn {turn}: The Imperator's dominion grows! Pledge loyalty or face imperial wrath!
casualMessage: The Imperator was reviewing expansion plans today. The throne's reach shall be infinite.
Rex the Eternal does not rest. The Imperator plans, schemes, and conquers endlessly.
By Imperial Decree: All is proceeding according to the Imperator's grand design.
